subject: URGENT: Your account and page will be disable (Account ID: )
description_text:
Your account and page will be disabled.

Hi Simsonn,

Based on our violation detection technology, your Facebook page is scheduled to be permanently deleted due to a post that violated our trademark rights. We made this decision after careful consideration and in compliance with our intellectual property protection policies.

Learn more  About_Copyright.

If you believe this is a misunderstanding, we kindly request that you submit an appeal to have your page reinstated before removing it from Facebook.
We understand that this situation may impact your ongoing business operations. However, please note that if we do not receive a complaint from you, our decision will be final, the system will automatically lock your page and you will no longer be able to use it. Request a review if you think this is a mistake:

FixÂ issue

Disabled

Intellectual property rights
.

Simsonn

ID:

Page does not comply with copyright protection policy:

Violation_of_intellectual_property_rights

According to Facebook's Terms of Service and Community Standards, you can only post content to Facebook that does not violate the intellectual property rights of others. The best way to ensure that content posted to Facebook does not violate copyright laws is to only post content that you created.

This message was sent to service@simsonn.com. If you don't want to receive these
emails from Meta in the future, please unsubscribe here.

Meta Platforms, Inc., Attention: Community Support, 1 Meta Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025
